songs.title: Real Pain
songs.lyrics:
Intro : uhnn yeah, glaaahhoww



Hook : Yeah you know i keep steel mane

I been walking through the storm i been going through some real pain

Run up on me i will flame

I be getting all this money why u pocket watching chill mane



Verse 1 : me and my niggas ball hard like kobe do

Switch to the motherfucking lakers like lebron dude

We on you 

Badda boo ping pong poo

All my niggas is on juice

And no it ain't bishop

Ill put the chopper to ya throat and give u hiccups

Damn me and my niggas live up

Got a motherfucking 40 in the bag its not liquor nigga
